original_text: And I myself also am persuaded of you, my brethren, that ye also are full of goodness, filled with all knowledge, able also to admonish one another.
korean_text: 내 형제들아 너희가 스스로 선함이 가득하고 모든 지식이 차서 능히 서로 권하는 자임을 나도 확신하노라

sentences.original_text: And I myself also am persuaded of you, my brethren,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나는 또한 여러분에 대해 확신하며, 나의 형제들이여,

sentences.original_text: that ye also are full of goodness,
able also to admonish one another.
